accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The manuscript is open for research.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Illinois State Charities Commission, Annual Report, Crerar Ms 242, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Commission was created in 1909 to succeed the State Board of Commissioners of Public Charities. Dr. Frank Billings was president of the Commission.

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Reports on committee expenditures and field investigations of Illinois orphanages, prisons, reform schools, poorhouses, and asylums.
